### getAnalysisUsage() {#a19ddb6c23028cd28bd1a8af5ce87d7c0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::BreakFalseDeps::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### pickBestRegisterForUndef() {#a2b13a9d8f8fcb25314915b90d4388df6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool BreakFalseDeps::pickBestRegisterForUndef (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, unsigned OpIdx, unsigned Pref)</>}>
Helps avoid false dependencies on undef registers by updating the machine instructions&#39; undef operand to use a register that the instruction is truly dependent on, or use a register with clearance higher than Pref.

Returns true if it was able to find a true dependency, thus not requiring a dependency breaking instruction regardless of clearance.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/breakfalsedeps-cpp/#l00084">84</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/breakfalsedeps-cpp">BreakFalseDeps.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### processDefs() {#a014369c63f5632d550239f205e047a62}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void BreakFalseDeps::processDefs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI)</>}>
Update def-ages for registers defined by MI.

Also break dependencies on partial defs and undef uses.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/breakfalsedeps-cpp/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/breakfalsedeps-cpp">BreakFalseDeps.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### processUndefReads() {#a625b642e357c9cd41e634cbb33360e12}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void BreakFalseDeps::processUndefReads (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB)</>}>
Break false dependencies on undefined register reads.

Walk the block backward computing precise liveness. This is expensive, so we only do it on demand. Note that the occurrence of undefined register reads that should be broken is very rare, but when they occur we may have many in a single block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/breakfalsedeps-cpp/#l00096">96</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/breakfalsedeps-cpp">BreakFalseDeps.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition

Return true to if it makes sense to break dependence on a partial def or undef use.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/breakfalsedeps-cpp/#l00089">89</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/breakfalsedeps-cpp">BreakFalseDeps.cpp</a>.
